translation.en: [Sara] Girls today can be anything.
CEO, Olympic golden medalist,
even a Supreme Court Justice.
We've finally broken that glass ceiling
and, wow, it sure looks good from the top.
translation.de: und von da oben sieht es toll aus.

translation.en: -[giggles] Ah! -[Kenny] Stop!
Hey, go brush your teeth. Wipe her face.
translation.de: Putz die Zähne. Wisch ihr Gesicht ab.

translation.en: Did you find your homework? And you, my little friend, you need pants.
translation.de: Hast du die Hausaufgaben? Du brauchst Hosen.

translation.en: Mom, can I stay home from school today?
translation.de: Mom, darf ich heute zu Hause bleiben?

translation.en: Nobody's staying home.
-I feel sick. -What hurts?
My spleen.
Specificity is good, but that's over the top.
translation.de: Genauigkeit ist gut, das ist übertrieben.

translation.en: Next time, try tummy.
It's go time. Let's go.
Okay, everyone's going to school. Mommy has something important to do.
translation.de: Alle gehen zur Schule. Mama muss was Wichtiges erledigen.

translation.en: [Amber] Oh, look.
[Kenny] Guys, look. Daddy's on TV again.
So what are you waiting for? A pig to fly?
translation.de: Worauf warten Sie? Dass Schweine fliegen? WIR FINANZIEREN - JEDER WIRD BEWILLIGT!

translation.en: All right, let's go. Line up. Train's a-leavin'.
-Love you. Love you. -Bye.
-Bags in the back. -Love you.
Love you.
Love you.
Tuna fish. Keep it in the fridge. [sighs]
[Sadie] Stop, stop, stop. Mom.
[Annie] You make your dad drop you off all the way back here?
translation.de: Setzt dich dein Vater hier ab?

translation.en: I don't know. [chuckles]
What's the girlfriend drive?
Oh! I'm so sorry. Did you need this?
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Brauchst du den?

translation.en: Love you, Sadie.
Can I have lunch money?
Ugh, come on. Did those kids take it again?
translation.de: Ach komm. Haben sie es dir wieder abgenommen?

translation.en: God, those douchebags. That was a 20.
translation.de: Diese Idioten. Das war ein Zwanziger.

translation.en: Well, small price to pay for the bone structure of my face.
translation.de: Ein kleiner Preis für den Knochenbau meines Gesichts.

translation.en: That's very true.
I don't wanna leave you without cash.
Excuse me, who is the adult here?
Don't answer that.
So, why aren't there any of these awesome women in my history book, huh?
translation.de: Warum ist keine dieser Frauen in meinem Geschichtsbuch?

translation.en: I'll tell you why.
Sister made the mistake of getting her period.
translation.de: Die Schwester machte den Fehler, ihre Tage zu bekommen.

translation.en: They say, "Behind every great man, there's a great woman."
translation.de: Man sagt: "Hinter jedem großen Mann steht eine große Frau."

translation.en: Well, I say that's some bull right there.
Well, none of these nasty women I just told you about
translation.de: Keine der Frauen, von denen ich euch erzählte,

translation.en: stood behind men.
-[pops lips] -They stood right beside them.
So, we gotta get it done ourselves, ladies.
translation.de: Wir müssen es selbst anpacken, Mädels.

translation.en: Am I right?
You get it, girl! You get it!
translation.de: Ja, Mädchen, du hast es verstanden!

translation.en: -We're gonna burn this patriarchy down! -Whoo!
Ain't nobody gonna stop her?
[Ruby] Okay, I'm out of here.
What's going on? You got an early shift?
I figured, you know, we could use the extra.
Mmm, I figured the same thing,
'cause I'm about to pull a double at the mall.
I'll make it work.
-You always do, boo. -I do.
I cannot believe you.
Chill, sis. I'm, like, two minutes late.
translation.de: Ganz ruhig. Ich komme zwei Minuten zu spät.

translation.en: How was Sara's thing?
Oh, she was so good.
She's so smart. I worry about mine.
translation.de: Sie ist so klug. Ich mache mir Sorgen um meine.

translation.en: [chuckles] Stop it.
[sighs] All right, you all ready for this?
-[sighs] -Now or never.
[Ruby] Let's do it.
[Annie] All right! Everybody be cool, and nobody gets hurt!
translation.de: Also gut! Bleiben Sie ruhig, dann wird niemand verletzt!

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, this is a robbery!
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren, das ist ein Überfall!

translation.en: -Oh, my lord! -[wax strip ripping]
Maybe we don't have to do the full Brazilian.
Oh, a Brazilian would put you in the hospital. This is just brush control.
translation.de: Der brächte Sie ins Krankenhaus. Ich trimme nur etwas.

translation.en: Yeah, I probably don't get in here as much as I used to.
translation.de: Ich komme nicht mehr so oft her wie sonst.

translation.en: [sarcastically] No.
My husband and I aren't having a lot of S-E-X right now.
translation.de: Mein Mann und ich haben im Moment nicht viel S-E-X.

translation.en: Maybe he just can't find it.
[sighs] Kids are back to school. I'm swamped. He's always working late.
translation.de: Die Kinder haben Schule. Ich bin überfordert. Er arbeitet lange.

translation.en: Plus, there's so much on the DVR.
translation.de: Und es gibt so viele Aufnahmen.

translation.en: It's really kind of hard to schedule--
Mrs. Boland? Your card was declined.
translation.de: Mrs. Boland? Ihre Karte wurde abgelehnt.

translation.en: Are you sure?
I ran it twice.
I'm sure he just forgot to pay the bill. He's been very distracted lately.
translation.de: Er hat bestimmt die Rechnung vergessen. Er ist sehr abgelenkt.

translation.en: Hey, there. Amber here, over at Boland Motors.
translation.de: Hey, ich bin Amber von Boland Motors. DETROITS AUTOHÄNDLER NR. 1

translation.en: We've got Chevys. We've got Fords. We've got Chryslers, too.
translation.de: Wir haben Chevys und Fords. Wir haben auch Chrysler.

translation.en: Have we got the car for you?
translation.de: Haben wir ein Auto für Sie?

translation.en: Do you think I could make it in LA?
translation.de: Könnte ich es in L.A. schaffen?

translation.en: It's not like Michigan. They have really good actresses there.
translation.de: Es ist nicht Michigan. Da gibt es gute Schauspielerinnen.

translation.en: You're gonna win one of those fancy awards.
translation.de: Du wirst einen dieser tollen Preise gewinnen.

translation.en: Like a People's Choice.
I don't need all that. I just wanna be super famous.
translation.de: Das brauche ich nicht. Ich will nur superberühmt werden.

translation.en: So, come on down to Boland Motors,
where we'll put the vroom, vroom, vroom back in your engine.
translation.de: wo wir das Röhren in Ihren Motor zurückbringen.

translation.en: Annie Bananie. Hey, you, uh, you got any plans later?
translation.de: Annie Bananie. Hast du später was vor?

translation.en: My church is having a "bring a friend" night.
You know, I'm just not really much of a church person.
translation.de: Ich mag die Kirche nicht so.

translation.en: You're definitely a stuck-up bitch.
I'm just kidding you.
Now, see, the old me totally would have meant that.
translation.de: Mein altes Ich hätte das so gemeint.

translation.en: But, uh, you know, born-again Boomer don't judge.
translation.de: Aber der wiedergeborene Boomer urteilt nicht.

translation.en: This, uh, came from your register last night.
translation.de: Das kam gestern Abend aus deiner Kasse.

translation.en: Know what it is?
Mmm. This is a tough one. It's a curling iron?
We in the biz say "counterfeit."
Now, see, I know it's counterfeit because I use the pen.
translation.de: Das weiß ich, weil ich den Stift benutze.

translation.en: Did you use the pen?
Boomer, I don't remember if--
I'm guessing you didn't, because if you had,
translation.de: Eher nicht, denn wäre es so,

translation.en: you would have known it's counterfeit. Which is why we have the pen.
translation.de: hättest du sie erkannt. Darum gibt es den Stift.

translation.en: So, unfortunately, I'm gonna have to dock this from your paycheck.
translation.de: Das muss ich dir vom Gehalt abziehen.

translation.en: Boomer, that's, like, a whole shift for me.
translation.de: Warte. Das ist eine ganze Schicht.

translation.en: Well, maybe next time you'll take security more seriously.
translation.de: Nimm nächstes Mal die Sicherheit ernster.

translation.en: Oh, come on. What security?
Excuse me, how much longer is the wait? 'Cause we've been...
translation.de: Wie lange müssen wir noch warten? Denn wir...

translation.en: [doctor] What I'm most concerned about right now is Stella's kidney function.
translation.de: Am meisten Sorgen bereitet mir Stellas Nierenfunktion.

translation.en: -What? -You said "Stella." Her name's Sara.
Okay, so, what about her kidneys?
[sighs] One is failing. The other one's right behind.
translation.de: Eine versagt. Die andere ist kurz davor.

translation.en: I would suggest that we put Sara
translation.de: Ich schlage vor, wir setzen Sara

translation.en: on a list for a transplant as soon as possible.
Carla, you just can't throw files like this.
translation.de: Sie können die Akten nicht so hinwerfen.

translation.en: [Carla] We just got ten walk-ins.
-I've been doing some reading. -Okay.
'Cause she can barely make it through the school day right now.
translation.de: Im Moment schafft sie es kaum durch den Schultag.

translation.en: [doctor] It's all willy-nilly over there.
-She can barely... -Okay? No.
...make it through the day, let alone soccer.
You might wanna keep her home and get a tutor.
translation.de: Sie sollten sie zu Hause unterrichten lassen.

translation.en: Are those last week's blood draws?
translation.de: Sind das die Blutwerte von letzter Woche?

translation.en: Well, my husband and I work all the time...
translation.de: Mein Mann und ich arbeiten ständig...

translation.en: -Here, Carla. -...so we can't.
-And... -[doctor] Take them all away.
And the transplant lists can take months, right?
[doctor] Separate. Thank you.
-And there's this new drug... -[doctor] Thank you.
-...that just got approved... -Take everything out.
Oh, my God! Can you please just listen to me for one damn minute?
translation.de: Meine Güte! Können Sie mir einfach mal eine Minute zuhören?

translation.en: Shame on you.
Shame on all of you. [crying]
[sighs] Eculizumab.
That's the name of the drug you're talking about?
-Yes. -It does.
It improves renal function dramatically.
It's also ten grand a month out of pocket.
translation.de: Es kostet aber zehn Riesen im Monat.

translation.en: And I'm guessing that may not be an option.
Well, I'll talk to my husband. We might be able to swing it.
translation.de: Ich rede mit meinem Mann. Wir könnten es hinbekommen.

translation.en: [Beth] And she was only halfway through my wax.
translation.de: Sie wachste mich erst zur Hälfte.

translation.en: So, what happened?
Well, now I'm very uneven.
-[Ruby] I don't even wanna know. -[chuckles]
Dean maxed out their credit card at some lingerie store.
translation.de: Dean reizte die Kreditkarte in einem Wäscheladen aus.

translation.en: Do you think he's sleeping around?
Don't nobody want Dean. It's a Christmas gift.
translation.de: Niemand will Dean. Es ist ein Weihnachtsgeschenk.

translation.en: [Beth] In October?
Maybe it's your anniversary present.
He already gave me 100 coupons to Bed Bath & Beyond.
translation.de: Er gab mir 100 Gutscheine für Bed, Bath & Beyond.

translation.en: Ew. Really?
Son of a bitch.
No, I really do love it there.
No. That old guy is stealing your tip.
translation.de: Nein. Der alte Kerl klaut dein Trinkgeld.

translation.en: He can't even walk.
-Go get it. -[Ruby sighs]
Shady SOB.
-Huh? Mmm-hmm. -[Ruby] Shady.
At my old job, we got robbed all the time. So I got the sixth sense now.
translation.de: Wir wurden dauernd ausgeraubt. Ich habe ein Gespür dafür.

translation.en: Are you serious?
I mean, it's no big deal.
All the stores I work at eventually get hit.
-You could get shot. -Ugh. One can hope.
These guys, they don't want to hurt anybody.
They just want the money. So we let them have it.
translation.de: Sie wollen nur Geld. Also geben wir es ihnen.

translation.en: Nobody's trying to be a hero.
-Do they get caught? -[scoffs] Yeah, the dumb ones do,
translation.de: Werden sie erwischt? Die Dummen schon,

translation.en: 'cause they park in the front by the security cameras.
translation.de: die parken vorne bei den Überwachungskameras.

translation.en: You gotta put your getaway car in the back by the loading dock.
translation.de: Man muss den Fluchtwagen an der Laderampe abstellen.

translation.en: And you never dick around with the registers.
translation.de: Man geht nie an die Kassen.

translation.en: The real money is back in the vault.
translation.de: Das echte Geld liegt im Tresor.

translation.en: You've really worked this out.
Just keeping my options open.
translation.de: Ich halte mir den Rücken frei.

translation.en: How much is in the vault?
Thirty grand, give or take.
Damn, I could use that money.
Oh, my God. Me, too.
So, when you wanna do this?
Well, I already bought three automatics and filed off the serial numbers.
translation.de: Ich feilte bei drei Halbautomatischen die Seriennummern ab.

translation.en: So, really, name a day.
You should see your face.
It's whiter than usual.
[Annie] I'm gonna need you to all get on the ground.
translation.de: Legen Sie sich auf den Boden.

translation.en: Get your cell phones out of your pockets and keep your hands where I can see 'em.
translation.de: Handys aus den Taschen, Hände dahin, wo ich sie sehen kann.

translation.en: All right, good.
Now, I need you to get your manager up here.
I said you need to get a manager up here right now.
Hey, where's y'all's boss at?
I better get a manager up here right now or I will start capping people!
translation.de: Holen Sie einen Manager, sonst bringe ich hier die Leute um!

translation.en: I'm not even joking, mother--
-You the manager? -Over there.
Hey. Hey, you. You.
-You, squirmy. Hey. Hey. Hey. -[grunting]
Are you in charge here?
[stammering] Yes. Yes, I am.
[Beth] Okay, then, you listen to me.
translation.de: Ok, dann hören Sie mir zu.

translation.en: You're gonna put on your big boy panties,
translation.de: Sie sind jetzt ein großer Junge

translation.en: and you're gonna tell your customers to stay calm,
translation.de: und sagen Ihren Kunden, sie sollen ruhig bleiben,

translation.en: and this will be over real soon.
[Annie] Get out of there.
Everybody stay calm, okay?
Now, you're gonna take my friend here to the cash vault.
translation.de: Jetzt bringen Sie meine Freundin zum Geldschrank.

translation.en: Move it before I shoot your face off! Let's go!
translation.de: Bewegung, bevor ich Ihr Gesicht wegpuste! Los!

translation.en: Now! Now! Now!
[sighs] Oh, my God.
[Ruby] Hey, Deadpool, you wanna...
Seriously?
You won't call me back.
I was busy.
So, here I am.
Well, I'm pretty sure I'm supposed to be helping customers,
not chatting with my ex. So...
So, now I'm a customer.
translation.de: Also, jetzt bin ich ein Kunde.

translation.en: Nancy and I are suing you for custody.
translation.de: Nancy und ich verklagen dich wegen des Sorgerechts.

translation.en: Club card?
There's a hearing next month. You should probably get yourself a lawyer.
translation.de: Nächsten Monat ist eine Anhörung. Nimm dir einen Anwalt.

translation.en: You know, if you sign up now, you get ten percent off your purchase.
translation.de: Wenn du dich jetzt anmeldest, bekommst du 10 % Rabatt.

translation.en: Annie, we were 17 when we decided all this stuff.
translation.de: Annie, wir waren 17, als wir das entschieden.

translation.en: Sadie would be happier with us now.
How do you figure, Greg?
We could send her to private school. St. Anne's.
She's an atheist who enjoys a jaunty bow tie.
translation.de: Sie ist Atheistin und trägt Fliegen.

translation.en: I don't really think that Catholic school is a good fit.
We could get her therapy.
She doesn't need therapy. She's figuring out who she is.
translation.de: Sie braucht keine Therapie. Sie findet sich selbst.

translation.en: And that's all great, but she's getting bullied, Annie.
Yes, by dickhead kids that need therapy.
translation.de: Von Idiotengören, die eine Therapie brauchen.

translation.en: Who's watching her now? I mean, it's after midnight.
translation.de: Wer passt auf sie auf? Es ist nach Mitternacht.

translation.en: The neighborhood girl. She's very good.
translation.de: Das Nachbarmädchen. Sie ist sehr gut.

translation.en: The one who got the DUI?
She lives within walking distance.
Buy her a new computer. Hers has been broken for a month.
translation.de: Kauf ihr einen neuen Computer. Ihrer ist seit einem Monat kaputt.

translation.en: Why didn't she tell me that?
Because she said she didn't wanna freak you out.
translation.de: Sie wollte dich nicht verrückt machen.

translation.en: [Annie] Why is it so crazy?
I mean, it's a victimless crime. The store is insured.
translation.de: Es ist ein Verbrechen ohne Opfer. Der Laden ist versichert.

translation.en: Plus, you know they make us work through lunch?
So it's basically tit for tat when you figure in the lost wages.
translation.de: Mit dem verlorenen Lohn ist das eine Retourkutsche.

translation.en: Oh, that will hold up in court.
Hey, no pop before dinner, sweetie.
translation.de: Keine Limo vor dem Essen, Schatz.

translation.en: But she gets it.
That's because I am a grown-up.
Technically.
Okay. You know, can't you just have my back on, like, one thing ever?
translation.de: Ok. Kannst du nicht ein Mal zu mir halten?

translation.en: This isn't me telling Mom and Dad that you smoked pot.
translation.de: Ich sage Mom und Dad nicht, dass du Gras rauchtest.

translation.en: -[kids laughing] -Which was incredibly lame, by the way.
This is me helping you not ruin your life.
translation.de: Ich helfe dir, dein Leben nicht zu ruinieren.

translation.en: Oh, because your life is so great. I should want this life?
translation.de: Weil dein Leben so toll ist. Sollte ich das wollen?

translation.en: I didn't say that.
You're, like, this Stepford mom without a pulse.
translation.de: Du bist wie eine Roboter-Mutter ohne Puls.

translation.en: I never said that.
You're cutting chicken fingers into stars. They're already fingers.
translation.de: Du schneidest Chicken Nuggets zu Sternen. Es sind Nuggets.

translation.en: And I mean... not to pile on, but look who you married.
translation.de: Ich will nicht noch draufhauen, aber schau, wen du geheiratet hast.

translation.en: It's 20 years and four children. Marriage sometimes takes a little work.
translation.de: Zwanzig Jahre und vier Kinder. Manchmal muss man an einer Ehe arbeiten.

translation.en: That is so romantic.
You could lose your daughter. Has that occurred to you?
translation.de: Du könntest deine Tochter verlieren. Schon daran gedacht?

translation.en: Well, seeing as Greg is suing me for custody
translation.de: Da mich Greg wegen des Sorgerechts verklagt,

translation.en: and I can't afford to fight it,
translation.de: und ich mir das nicht leisten kann,

translation.en: yes, actually, the thought has crossed my mind.
translation.de: ist mir der Gedanke tatsächlich schon gekommen.

translation.en: I didn't know.
Now you know.
Hey, there. Amber here, over at Boland Motors.
translation.de: Hey, ich bin Amber von Boland Motors. BEQUEM AN DER I-96

translation.en: Jeez. Who did this chick have to blow to get on TV? [scoffs]
translation.de: Wem musste sie dafür einen blasen?

translation.en: [Amber] ...around town?
So what are you waiting for? A pig to fly?
translation.de: Worauf warten Sie? Dass Schweine fliegen?

translation.en: So come on down to Boland Motors,
where we'll put the vroom, vroom, vroom back in your engine.
translation.de: wo wir das Röhren in Ihren Motor zurückbringen. BRUMM!

translation.en: Is your babysitter free?
Mmm. They took away her license. She's always home.
translation.de: Sie nahmen ihr den Führerschein. Sie ist immer daheim.

translation.en: It's this charge here.
Could you just tell me exactly what was bought?
translation.de: Können Sie mir sagen, was gekauft wurde?

translation.en: It's against policy to divulge information on previous purchases.
translation.de: Es verstößt gegen die Richtlinien, Infos über Käufe rauszugeben.

translation.en: For privacy concerns.
Oh, but it's on her bill, so...
translation.de: Aber es steht auf ihrer Rechnung, also...

translation.en: Then she should remember what she bought.
translation.de: Dann sollte sie wissen, was sie gekauft hat.

translation.en: Well, I remember that I bought it for a friend.
translation.de: Ich weiß noch, dass ich es für eine Freundin kaufte.

translation.en: And she loved it so much, she really went nuts for it.
translation.de: Sie mochte es so sehr, sie war wirklich verrückt danach.

translation.en: But then, she was in an accident.
With a driver. Texting.
translation.de: Mit einem Fahrer. Beim Nachricht schreiben.

translation.en: It was the other driver texting, not my friend. She'd never do that.
translation.de: Es war der andere, nicht sie. Das würde sie nie tun.

translation.en: But she's been in a coma ever since,
translation.de: Aber seitdem liegt sie im Koma,

translation.en: and her brain is, like, ten times the size it should be.
translation.de: und ihr Hirn ist zehn Mal so groß, wie es sein sollte.

translation.en: Um... I just thought, "Wouldn't it be a nice gesture,
if she wakes up..."
-When she wakes up. Stay positive. -Yeah.
"...to have her favorite pair of undies waiting."
'Cause she was wearing the last pair
translation.de: Denn sie trug das letzte Paar,

translation.en: -when she got in the accident. -Mmm-hmm. Mmm-hmm.
And the paramedics had to cut them off of her.
You know, Jaws of Life style.
Darn it, if I cannot remember the size that I got...
translation.de: Wenn mir die Größe nicht mehr einfällt...

translation.en: And I obviously feel stupid asking her family.
translation.de: Ich komme mir dumm vor, wenn ich ihre Familie frage.

translation.en: -Mmm, can't do that. -So could you just look it up?
Okay, just give me one second, please.
translation.de: Ok, geben Sie mir bitte einen Moment.

translation.en: Damn. That was a good sell.
This is so crazy. It'll be something for you.
translation.de: Das ist so verrückt. Das ist sicher für dich.

translation.en: Here it is. This was it?
translation.de: Hier ist sie. War es das?

translation.en: Okay, yeah, that's probably not for you. [chuckles softly]
translation.de: Ok, das ist wohl nicht für dich.

translation.en: [Annie] Okay. It's gonna be okay. We're gonna have a drink. Oof...
translation.de: Ok. Alles wird gut. Gehen wir was trinken.

translation.en: We're gonna have ten drinks.
Uh, hey, do you know the difference between a Manhattan and a sidecar?
I always forget. Something about vermouth whispering--
translation.de: Ich vergesse es immer. Flüsternder Wermut oder so...

translation.en: Guess who found caramel bugles at Kroger?
What is going on? The Bachelorette is on. Hello.
translation.de: Was ist los? The Bachelorette läuft. Hallo.

translation.en: [mouthing] Dean's having an affair.
What?
Dean is having an affair.
[mouthing] Dean is...
[normal] Son of a bitch.
Oh, honey. What can we do?
How about a screwdriver?
translation.de: Wie wäre es mit einem Screwdriver?

translation.en: A sledgehammer.
What?
You planning on stopping this?
Nah. You?
Nah, I'm good.
What is it?
Oh, my God.
Does he have another ho?
[Beth] If you're looking for the vodka, I drank it.
[Dean] What are you doing in the dark?
Guess I'm used to it after 20 years.
translation.de: Nach 20 Jahren bin ich es gewöhnt.

translation.en: What does that mean?
It means your child bride wears very expensive underwear.
translation.de: Dass deine Kindsbraut sehr teure Unterwäsche trägt.

translation.en: What happened to us?
I was stupid.
I was stupid and...
It doesn't even matter.
Why do we have three mortgages that we haven't paid?
translation.de: Warum haben wir drei Hypotheken, die wir nicht bezahlt haben?

translation.en: Why do our credit cards all have advances on them
translation.de: Warum haben unsere Kreditkarten einen Vorschuss

translation.en: and we have hardly anything in our accounts?
translation.de: und wir kaum etwas auf dem Konto?

translation.en: Look, I made a few bad decisions at work.
Oh, my God.
I tried to fix it with a couple of investments,
translation.de: Ich wollte es mit Anlagen retten,

translation.en: and I should have been...
I should have been more careful. I panicked.
translation.de: Ich hätte vorsichtiger sein sollen. Ich bekam Panik.

translation.en: We have four children.
I know.
Are we going to lose this house?
Look, I dropped the ball. That's all.
Are we going to lose the house?
No!
I mean, I don't know.
Maybe.
We might.
We could lose everything.
[crying] I'm so sorry.
We're gonna rob that store.
What?
-We're gonna rob that store. -Yes!
Have you lost your mind?
[Ruby] We were just kidding about the store, Beth.
Hey, I wasn't.
-Well, I was. -Why? You need it just as bad as we do.
translation.de: -Ich schon. -Warum? Du brauchst es genauso dringend.

translation.en: We just do it once. And we get some money.
translation.de: Wir machen es nur ein Mal und bekommen Geld.

translation.en: Oh, dear God.
[Beth] You can help your little girl.
You can take care of this custody thing.
translation.de: Du kümmerst dich um das Sorgerecht.

translation.en: And I get to save my family. And we're done.
translation.de: Ich rette meine Familie. Dann sind wir fertig.

translation.en: We never do it again,
and we don't sit back and let everything be taken away from us.
translation.de: und wir lehnen uns nicht zurück und lassen uns alles nehmen.

translation.en: No one's gonna fix this. We have to do this ourselves.
translation.de: Niemand richtet das. Wir müssen es selbst tun.

translation.en: [Ruby] What is taking so long?
[Beth] I don't know.
How old are you?
Let me guess. Six?
Do you watch Doc McStuffins? [chuckles]
Uh, yeah, we, um, used to... watch it in the Big House.
translation.de: Ja, wir schauten es... im Knast.

translation.en: -[Annie] Move it, you little weenie! -Ow!
Uh, I'm going as fast as I can.
translation.de: Ich mache, so schnell ich kann.

translation.en: Come on!
Get out of the way!
Stay right there!
[Ruby] Holy crap.
We gotta go. We gotta go! We gotta go!
Oh, shit!
-[Ruby] Let's go! -[Beth] Nope. Turn around!
-Hurry! -[Annie] I got it!
-[Ruby] We gotta go! -[Annie] What?
[Beth] Go! Go! Go! Go, go, go!
Gotta go! We've gotta go.
There. Out there. They're going out the back!
Get them!
[Ruby] Beth. Hello?
Are you okay in there? What's your name?
translation.de: Geht es dir gut? Wie heißt du?

translation.en: I robbed a grocery store.
[Ruby] Who's Secretary of State?
I robbed a grocery store.
Who is Secretary of State?
We robbed a grocery store.
Oh, we totally did.
And we actually got away with it.
Like some smooth criminals.
Uh, how much did we get? Tell me we got the 30.
translation.de: Wie viel haben wir? Sag mir, wir haben die 30.

translation.en: We got it.
-[both sigh] -Thank you, God.
We got more than the 30 grand.
translation.de: Wir haben mehr als die 30 Riesen.

translation.en: How much more?
What in the hell?
How is this even possible?
-Count it again. -I counted it right.
Count it again!
You said there would be 30.
I said, "30, give or take." I guess it was give.
translation.de: "30, mehr oder weniger." Waren wohl mehr.

translation.en: Why does a grocery store even have this kind of money on hand?
translation.de: Warum hat ein Supermarkt so viel Geld parat?

translation.en: Because it's hella shady. I told you this was a bad idea.
translation.de: Weil es dubios ist. Das war keine gute Idee.

translation.en: You guys are missing the point. We just won half a million dollars!
translation.de: Ihr versteht nicht, worum es geht. Wir gewannen eine halbe Million!

translation.en: -We didn't win anything. -Half a mil, bitches!
We didn't win it!
We stole it!
And maybe the cops don't follow up on $30,000.
translation.de: Vielleicht gehen die Bullen $30.000 nicht nach.

translation.en: They damn sure follow up on half a million dollars.
translation.de: Aber einer halben Million Dollar sehr wohl.

translation.en: What do we do?
Nothing.
We divide it up and we sit on it...
translation.de: Wir teilen es auf und behalten es,

translation.en: until we can come up with a way to get rid of it quietly.
translation.de: bis wir einen Weg finden, es heimlich loszuwerden.

translation.en: Without looking like, you know...
-Criminals. -[Ruby] Yeah.
What is this?
Turbo S. You know, it's similar to the model that douche-face Nancy has.
translation.de: Ein Turbo S. Ein ähnliches Modell wie das der dämlichen Nancy.

translation.en: But more features, more cylinders. You know, more cooler.
translation.de: Mehr Ausstattung, mehr Zylinder. Du weißt schon, cooler.

translation.en: Why don't you check under your seat?
Who are you? Oprah?
You get a laptop, and you get a laptop, and you get a laptop!
translation.de: Du bekommst einen Laptop, du bekommst einen Laptop, und du auch!

translation.en: I don't get it.
Uh, how to have fun? Yes, I can see that.
translation.de: Wie man Spaß hat? Das sehe ich.

translation.en: No. How you have money for all this.
translation.de: Nein. Woher du das Geld hast.

translation.en: Would you just let me worry about that?
translation.de: Lass das mal meine Sorge sein.

translation.en: -But-- -Who is the adult here?
-Mom. -Who is the adult? Who's the adult?
Come on, let's go tailgate some old people.
translation.de: Komm schon, bedrängen wir alte Leute.

translation.en: Hey, Mrs. Boland, nice weather we're having.
translation.de: Hey, Mrs. Boland, schönes Wetter heute.

translation.en: Afternoon, Mrs. Boland.
I'm gonna have to call you back.
Uh, Mrs. Boland, hi. What are you doing here?
translation.de: Mrs. Boland, hi. Was machen Sie hier?

translation.en: I'm here to clean up a mess, Amber.
What mess?
You. Sit.
Don't worry. I mostly blame him.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Ich gebe ihm die Schuld.

translation.en: He should know better. You're obviously stupid.
translation.de: Er sollte es besser wissen. Sie sind offenbar dumm.

translation.en: Oh, it's not a knock. We all have our strengths and weaknesses.
translation.de: Das ist keine Kritik. Wir alle haben Stärken und Schwächen.

translation.en: You're a beautiful dummy. It doesn't make you a bad person.
translation.de: Sie sind ein hübscher Dummkopf, aber kein schlechter Mensch.

translation.en: So... here's what's going to happen.
You're going to quit your job and my husband, effective immediately.
translation.de: Sie kündigen Ihren Job und meinem Mann, ab sofort.

translation.en: Trust me, they're both a dead end.
translation.de: Glauben Sie mir, beide sind eine Sackgasse.

translation.en: This is five grand.
Enough for a plane ticket and a little to get you started in LA.
translation.de: Genug für ein Ticket und Startgeld in L.A.

translation.en: I do wanna warn you about something, though.
translation.de: Aber ich will Sie vor etwas warnen.

translation.en: What's that?
Those folks out there, they take one look at a person like you...
translation.de: Die Leute da draußen schauen jemanden wie Sie an...

translation.en: The pretty, the dumb, the self-hating,
translation.de: Das Hübsche, das Dumme, den Selbsthass,

translation.en: and they figure... perfect for porn.
translation.de: und sie denken... perfekt für Pornos.

translation.en: Why are you doing this?
Because we both deserve more than a liar in a pig suit.
translation.de: Weil wir beide mehr verdienen als einen Lügner im Schweinekostüm.

translation.en: Me more than you, but still.
translation.de: Ich mehr als Sie, aber trotzdem.

translation.en: That's the nicest thing that anyone's ever said to me.
translation.de: Das ist das Netteste, was ich je hörte.

translation.en: Really?
Oh, no.
Doctor, I know you're busy and I won't waste your time.
translation.de: Ich weiß, Sie sind beschäftigt, ich störe nicht lange.

translation.en: But I've been doing a lot of research here on different drugs and things.
translation.de: Ich habe viel nachgeforscht, über verschiedene Medikamente und so.

translation.en: Um, it has this crazy-ass name.
Um, but I know it's all out of pocket.
translation.de: Aber ich weiß, ich muss es aus eigener Tasche zahlen.

translation.en: You're touching me.
Why are you touching me?
Because you've been here for ten minutes and you've barely taken a breath.
translation.de: Sie sind seit zehn Minuten hier und holten kaum Luft.

translation.en: The new med's a great option.
Definitely worth trying before we go down the transplant road.
translation.de: Vor der Transplantation einen Versuch wert.

translation.en: I've got samples.
We'll start her on it and see how she does.
translation.de: Wir fangen an und schauen, wie es läuft.

translation.en: In the meantime, let's do a CT, creatinine clearance and an ultrasound.
translation.de: Derweil machen wir ein CT, Kreatinin-Clearance und einen Ultraschall.

translation.en: Cover all bases.
-Can we get some water in here, please? -[man] Yes, of course.
Oh, is cucumber-infused okay?
[crying] Oh, my God, yes.
-[chuckles] -Can I get lemon, too?
You forgot your paycheck. Lot of money in here. [chuckles]
translation.de: Du hast deinen Gehaltsscheck vergessen. Viel Geld.

translation.en: Thanks.
Hey, how did you have the balls to do it?
translation.de: Woher hattest du den Mut dafür?

translation.en: You and the girls get all get coked up or something beforehand?
translation.de: Haben du und die Mädels vorher gekokst?

translation.en: What?
I saw your ass tat.
I don't know what you're talking--
How many chicks have a tramp stamp that says, "All You Need Is Love"?
translation.de: Wie viele haben einen Nuttenstempel mit "All you need is love"?

translation.en: It's a very popular song.
translation.de: Es ist ein sehr beliebtes Lied.

translation.en: Well, then, uh, I guess you won't mind if I go to the cops then, right?
translation.de: Dann hast du nichts dagegen, wenn ich zu den Bullen gehe?

translation.en: If it wasn't you, I'm sure you got some explanation
translation.de: Wenn du es nicht warst, hast du sicher eine Erklärung,

translation.en: for how you bought all this on minimum wage.
translation.de: wie du das alles mit dem Mindestlohn gekauft hast.

translation.en: [grunts] I didn't say nothing.
Cops came, but I didn't tell them.
translation.de: Die Bullen kamen, aber ich hab nichts verraten.

translation.en: What do you want? [shuddering] You want money?
It's not like that.
What's it like, then?
I got your back. I'm gonna keep my mouth shut.
translation.de: Ich stehe hinter dir. Ich werde die Klappe halten.

translation.en: Thanks.
I mean, I'm really gonna try.
I am. I hope I can. [inhales deeply]
translation.de: Wirklich. Ich hoffe, ich schaffe es.

translation.en: I don't know. I just get so lonely.
translation.de: Ich weiß es nicht. Ich bin so einsam.

translation.en: Well... [chuckles] I'm sorry to be crass here, but, uh...
translation.de: Tut mir leid, wenn ich zu direkt bin,

translation.en: horny, too.
I just wanna shoot my mouth off.
Talk and talk till I'm, um...
satisfied.
-Can we just get it over with? Okay? -Oh, but, hey, hey.
translation.de: Bringen wir es hinter uns. Aber, hey.

translation.en: I'm not some "Wham! Bam! Thank you, ma'am."
You know? I need a little romance.
translation.de: Weißt du? Ich brauche etwas Romantik.

translation.en: Hi, honey. I thought you were asleep.
translation.de: Hi, Schatz. Ich dachte, du schläfst schon.

translation.en: And here it is. Found it.
He lost some change in the couch, so I was just helping him find it.
translation.de: Er verlor Kleingeld auf der Couch, ich half ihm beim Suchen.

translation.en: -Thanks. -Yeah, no problem.
Oh, Sadie, honey, this is my, uh... Boomer.
translation.de: Sadie, Schatz, das ist mein... Boomer.

translation.en: I work with him at work. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich arbeite mit ihm auf der Arbeit.

translation.en: You know, so... But he has to go now, because he was... He has to...
translation.de: Weißt du, also... Er muss jetzt gehen, denn er wollte... Er muss...

translation.en: I have to use the quarters on the vending machines.
translation.de: Ich muss die Vierteldollars für die Automaten nehmen.

translation.en: I was going to maybe fill a meter or two, to surprise someone.
translation.de: Ich wollte Parkuhren auffüllen, um jemanden zu überraschen.

translation.en: -Hey, that's nice. -Yeah. Pay it forward or whatever.
translation.de: Hey, das ist nett. Etwas vorschießen oder so.

translation.en: Just go.
[Boomer] You know, uh...
since I have all this bus fare now,
I'll probably be back soon.
Good morning.
I'm gonna need the PINs and passcodes to the accounts.
translation.de: Ich brauche die PINs und Passwörter für die Konten.

translation.en: Mortgage, bank, credit cards.
Uh, it's 2 Fast 2 Furious.
It's the number two, like the movie.
translation.de: Die Zahl zwei, wie der Film.

translation.en: I know it's a movie.
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass es ein Film ist.

translation.en: That's for all of them?
I handled the mortgage.
[stutters] How did you do that?
I handled it because you couldn't.
translation.de: Ich machte es, weil du nicht konntest.

translation.en: And this thing that we do...
where you bring home the bacon and I don't ask any questions?
translation.de: ...wo du das Geld heimbringst und ich keine Fragen stelle?

translation.en: That's over.
Does that mean we get to stay in the house?
translation.de: Also können wir im Haus bleiben?

translation.en: It means I get to stay in the house with the kids.
translation.de: Ich bleibe mit den Kindern im Haus.

translation.en: You get to go to a motel.
Your clothes are in the car.
Still no leads on last week's armed robbery of Fine & Frugal.
translation.de: Noch keine Hinweise zum Raub bei Fine & Frugal letzte Woche.

translation.en: A rep from the local...
You don't think it's weird?
What?
Our GoFundMe page has been up for years.
translation.de: Unsere GoFundMe-Seite gibt es seit Jahren.

translation.en: Some anonymous donor rolls in now with all that cash?
translation.de: Jetzt kommt ein anonymer Spender mit Bargeld?

translation.en: [Ruby] It's a miracle.
Why question it?
See this?
I do.
Our girl's coming back.
[chuckles] Hey... Okay, bruiser. All right, ease up on 'em. You got him.
translation.de: Hey... Ok, Rabauke. Schalt einen Gang runter. Du hast ihn.

translation.en: -[Sara grunts] -[Stan] Look at you.
Hey, buddy. What's wrong?
You need to go potty? You need to peepee?
translation.de: Musst du aufs Klo? Musst du Pipi?

translation.en: Nah, he's good.
We already took him out.
What do you want?
Oh, relax, sweetheart.
I just need you to call your lady friends over
so we can all have... a little talk.
About what?
Oh, about the money you stole from us.
translation.de: Über das Geld, das ihr uns geklaut habt.

translation.en: Yo, this backsplash is dope.
Hey, what's it made out of? Marble?
Yo, you ever get any problems with staining back here?
translation.de: Hast du je Probleme mit Flecken?

translation.en: Like, if you're cooking a big pot of spaghetti sauce
translation.de: Wenn du einen großen Topf Soße kochst

translation.en: or something like that?
No, I don't think so.
No? [chuckles]
We didn't know you owned the store.
translation.de: Wir wussten nicht, dass euch der Laden gehört.

translation.en: I look like some kind of grocery store manager to you?
translation.de: Sehe ich aus wie ein Supermarkt-Manager?

translation.en: Or, like, Rotary club or something?
No, let's just say that we got certain arrangements
with some local businesses.
And we help each other out and whatnot. You know?
translation.de: Wir helfen uns gegenseitig und so.

translation.en: Like... money laundering for drugs? I told you it was shady.
translation.de: Wie... Geldwäsche für Drogen? Ich sagte euch, das ist dubios.

translation.en: Why don't you stop worrying about my business dealings
translation.de: Sorgt euch nicht um meine Geschäfte

translation.en: and start figuring how you're gonna pay me my money back.
translation.de: und löst, wie ihr mir das Geld zurückzahlt.

translation.en: -We can get it back. -Oh, that would be great.
Most of it.
Sorry, what?
[Annie stammers] Some of it, for sure.
[sighs] Oh, what, like you guys didn't spend a dime?
translation.de: Als ob ihr nichts ausgegeben hättet.

translation.en: How much, Annie?
I don't know. I probably spent, like, a hundred... grand.
[both] What?
I'm gonna shoot you myself.
Nah, you're just gonna pay me back is all.
translation.de: Nein, ihr zahlt es mir einfach zurück.

translation.en: I mean, right quick, too. With interest.
So, we'll see you real soon, yeah?
translation.de: Wir sehen uns ganz bald, ja?

translation.en: You've really got to be careful, ladies.
translation.de: Ihr müsst vorsichtig sein, meine Damen.

translation.en: I mean, with citrus on marble, like lemon and whatnot.
translation.de: Zitrussäure auf Marmor, Zitrone und so.

translation.en: That stuff will erode like crazy.
[Kenny] Why can't Daddy come home?
Your daddy and I love you so much. And I know it's confusing.
translation.de: Euer Papa und ich lieben euch sehr. Ich weiß, das ist verwirrend.

translation.en: Daddy's gotta stay here while he and I work on some grown-up stuff.
translation.de: Daddy bleibt eine Weile hier, während wir an etwas arbeiten.

translation.en: You can have whatever candy you want -from the vending machines, okay? -[kids] Yay!
translation.de: Ihr dürft euch Süßes aus dem Automaten holen.

translation.en: -Hey. -Pick the kids up from school
translation.de: Hol die Kinder von der Schule

translation.en: and bring them straight back here. Don't go to the park or anywhere.
translation.de: und bring sie gleich hierher. Geh nicht in den Park.

translation.en: I can't have the kids here. I've got, like, one twin bed.
translation.de: Sie können nicht bleiben. Ich habe nur ein Doppelbett.

translation.en: You just have to.
What's going on?
I can't tell you.
Wait. Uh, stop. Are you okay?
translation.de: Warte. Stopp. Geht es dir gut?

translation.en: Just take care of my babies.
Hey, who wants, uh... Who wants pizza?
-[Kenny] I do! -[kids cheer]
I would have picked you up down the block, but your cell was off.
translation.de: Ich hätte dich weiter unten abgeholt, aber dein Handy war aus.

translation.en: [Sadie] Where's the Porsche?
I sold it. I had to.
Is that a cassette deck?
What?
And manual roll-down windows?
Yas, Queen.
Mmm-hmm. Cloth interior. Nice. Leather burns your ass.
translation.de: Stoff-Interieur. Nett. Leder verbrennt dir den Hintern.

translation.en: How did you get to be so awesome?
Don't ride in Porsches.
[Ruby] Who is it?
I said, who is it?
-[Stan] Me. -[sighs]
[laughs] What the hell are you doing?
I want an alarm system. And can you please fix the back gate?
translation.de: Ich will eine Alarmanlage. Und kannst du das hintere Tor reparieren?

translation.en: I said I would.
You said it, but it just sits there, wide open.
translation.de: Du hast es gesagt, aber es steht noch offen.

translation.en: Got your bat out.
You could've gotten the knife out of the drawer, baby.
translation.de: Du hättest das Messer nehmen können.

translation.en: All right. I'm sorry.
-I'm sorry. Calm down. I'm sorry. -[groans] God.
You scared? Your heart's beating. Come here. Breathe. Breathe.
translation.de: Hast du Angst? Dein Herz rast. Komm her. Atme.

translation.en: What did I tell you?
All this right here is all the security you need, baby.
translation.de: Du brauchst nur das alles hier für die Sicherheit, Baby.

translation.en: -You don't need no Wiffle bat. -Hmm. Is that so?
Yeah, that's so, because your man here, you know...
is no longer gonna be trailing teenagers at the Great Steak & Fry.
translation.de: verfolgt keine Teenager mehr bei Great Steak & Fry.

translation.en: -You applied to the police academy? -I did.
translation.de: -Du hast dich bei der Polizei beworben? -Ja.

translation.en: Yeah. I didn't tell you in case I got rejected.
translation.de: Ich sagte nichts, falls ich abgelehnt werde.

translation.en: Brother ain't get rejected.
Oh. Detroit's finest, baby. Protect and serve.
translation.de: Detroiter Polizei, Baby. Dein Freund und Helfer.

translation.en: Give me some.
-[Beth] Where are we at? -[Ruby] Short.
[Beth] By how much?
[Ruby] Over sixty grand.
-[sighs] -What about the car?
I took it back. Lost over half its value, B-T-dubs.
translation.de: Ich gab es zurück. Verlor übrigens die Hälfte des Werts.

translation.en: Well, maybe you shouldn't have bought it in the first place.
translation.de: Du hättest es nicht kaufen sollen.

translation.en: My, what a helpful contribution. Let me just grab my time machine.
translation.de: Wie hilfreich. Ich hole kurz meine Zeitmaschine.

translation.en: Oh, my God. We should just go to the police.
translation.de: Mein Gott. Wir sollten zur Polizei gehen.

translation.en: [Annie] Wait. What?
[Ruby] We haven't done anything that bad yet. We don't have records.
translation.de: Wir haben nichts Schlimmes getan. Haben keine Vorstrafen.

translation.en: [Annie] Uh, yes. Now we do.
[Ruby] If we just explain to them that--
Explain what, that we meant well?
translation.de: Was, dass wir es gut meinten?

translation.en: Gee, Officer, we're sorry. We didn't mean to piss off the gang.
translation.de: Tut uns leid. Wir wollten die Gang nicht verärgern.

translation.en: -We just wanted to rob the grocery store. -Okay, I'm just trying not to die, okay?
translation.de: Wir wollten nur den Supermarkt ausrauben. Ich versuche, nicht zu sterben. Wenn du einen besseren Plan hast...

translation.en: -If you have a better plan-- -Actually, yes, I do.
translation.de: Ich versuche, nicht zu sterben. Wenn du einen besseren Plan hast... Den habe ich.

translation.en: We should take it from somewhere else.
We'll just steal it and then we'll pay them back
translation.de: Wir klauen es und zahlen es ihnen zurück,

translation.en: and then we'll just put the whole thing to bed.
translation.de: dann legen wir das zu den Akten.

translation.en: Bitch, are you out of your mind?
-It's the best possible plan! -[Beth] Enough!
Enough!
Enough.
We're gonna get that money. We're gonna figure it out.
translation.de: Wir holen uns das Geld. Wir lösen das.

translation.en: Because we are strong and resourceful.
translation.de: Denn wir sind stark und einfallsreich.

translation.en: And we've accomplished way harder than this.
I once made 300 cupcakes in one night,
translation.de: Ich machte mal 300 Cupcakes an einem Abend,

translation.en: and they were nut and gluten-free.
The kid still had an allergy attack.
translation.de: Das Kind hatte trotzdem einen allergischen Anfall.

translation.en: And you don't always have to fact-check me, okay?
I'm gonna take a shower.
I smell like booze and crime.
translation.de: Ich rieche nach Alkohol und Verbrechen.

translation.en: [Ruby] Call you tomorrow.
-[sighs] Boomer, I, uh... -Oh? Bad time?
Very.
Hey, come on. Don't be rude.
Oh, God. Boomer, you're wasted.
translation.de: Oh, Gott. Boomer, du bist betrunken.

translation.en: You know, I was just thinking about how we didn't finish what we started.
translation.de: Ich dachte daran, dass wir nicht beendeten, was wir begannen.

translation.en: -Boomer, it's not... Stop. Stop. -[chuckles] What?
Why don't we just have a little bit of fun?
translation.de: Warum haben wir nicht etwas Spaß?

translation.en: Boomer, hey, hey. Stop.
My sister is here.
[pants] Yeah? Is she hot?
I'll be fast, I promise.
-Did you just hit me? -[panting]
[grunts] Stop! No!
You're hurting me!
That's how you like it, right, tough girl? Come on. You can rob a store, right?
translation.de: So magst du es, hartes Mädchen? Kannst einen Laden ausrauben?

translation.en: Get off of her!
-Whoa! Hey, hey, hey. Hey, easy. -[crying]
All right, no need to get upset.
All right? No need to get upset.
Oh, do I look upset? Why would I be upset?
translation.de: Sehe ich so aus? Warum sollte ich wütend sein?

translation.en: Because every man in the world thinks
he can do whatever he wants whenever he wants?
translation.de: er kann tun, was er will, wann er will?

translation.en: Okay, okay. Hey, we were just having a little bit of fun. All right?
translation.de: Ok. Wir haben nur etwas Spaß. Klar?

translation.en: Oh, was that what that was? Because you see...
translation.de: Das sollte es sein? Hören Sie gut zu...

translation.en: when a lady screams "stop,"
it is usually because she is not having the time of her life.
translation.de: macht sie das normal, wenn sie sich nicht amüsiert.

translation.en: But what do I know?
Now, you're gonna pull up your pants
translation.de: Sie ziehen jetzt Ihre Hosen hoch

translation.en: and you are gonna get the hell out of here.
Get out!
Is that a...
toy gun?
No.
[sighs] Yeah, it is.
No, it's not.
Okay, then...
shoot me, hmm?
You stupid bitches.
You're going down.
Boomer! Boomer! Please! You need money? We'll get you money.
translation.de: Bitte! Brauchst du Geld? Wir beschaffen dir Geld.

translation.en: -Oh, no, I'm turning you in. -Boomer, please. Please.
You know how fast they're gonna lock you up
translation.de: Weißt du, wie schnell sie dich einsperren

translation.en: -and take away your loser kid? -No, Boomer. Please.
Yeah, your dumbass sister, too. The two of you are so done.
translation.de: Deine Schwester auch. Ihr beide seid erledigt.

translation.en: You're gonna rot in jail.
Yeah, you think you're so much better than everyone.
translation.de: Du denkst, du bist besser als alle anderen.

translation.en: Well, now you are finished. It is over.
translation.de: Jetzt bist du am Ende. Es ist vorbei.

translation.en: No, please! [screams]
-Oh, my God! -[groans]
You...
Is he...
He's not.
No.
Are you sure?
No.
[sighs] What do we do now?
We're not going to the police.
